definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
administrative subdivision (e.g. of provinces into counties)

sentences.english: The division into sub-categories is thus not totally clear, with the frequent occurrence of overlapping, arousing criticism from later scholars.
sentences.chinese: 類別往往混淆，區畫或有交疊，引起後世研究者質疑。
